data.message: Why is everyone forgien posting about an album or new song? This is a post about clothing.

replies.message: Because they are excited about a new album?
Obviously Jessica Rose your oblivious because these clothes from carhartt are in collaboration with eminem for his new album coming out. Get with the program
How about it's social media and a chance for people to express themselves and they actually think Eminem will actually read it.  Plus who the fuck made this bitch the social media police.
Actually its not in collaboration with his album. He does a clothing release every black Friday. Last time I checked he didn't come out with an album every year
All I'm saying is that it is literally on everything he posts, people are thinking that this is an album... It's clothing. Careful who you call a bitch

So they must limit themselfs to talk in about clothes? May e, u dumb bitch, t hey r talking about an album because Eminem is and artist that has am album coming out.... U dumb silly cunt fuck off and die
Wow you're smart, if you read my comment you would realize I was saying I don't get why they are posting about it on a completely irrelevant post, or is that a big word you can't understand?
If you ever feel like looking in my account
You will understand what it means to be more than a fan after you learn the ways of the lands where the whole story began and how he fought his story's part of his self true to the ground.

Jessica, before every album he usually released a teaser track... he recently posted a track called " campaign speech " to his official youtube so the whole world who are just as much fans as anyone on the same slab of land as he is are getting excited for it due to the usual trend, which you should know ?
I've explained a million times, not that hard to understand, read previous comment

Car--heart  
...Joe's military used to sell ...?? Have not been their ages ...
Thots note to Emin3m... Marquita made it thru high school. .. 
Thanks bro
